title: varadAyikE (lakSmi)
sahitya:
varadAyikE (lakSmi) (shrI lakSmi) varadAyikE


anupallavi

 akhila bhuvana paripAlini nikhila niranjani, nArAyaNa nAyikE


caraNam   sakala jana vandita bhakta pAlini vimala hrdaya sadAnanda vadani
(madyamakAlam)
mAlini, manO vilAsini pUraNi purushOttama hrdaya vAsini
suhAsini jyotisvaruupiNi vikAsini sarvAnanda kAriNi
